name: chondrosarcoma
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of bone cancer that develops in the cartilage cells and usually affects the bones of the arms, legs, and pelvis and sometimes also the joints. It is malignant (= likely to cause death if not treated): Usually originating in strong connective tissue, chondrosarcomas grow slowly.
